attributes.action: Ban President Putin, family and friends from setting foot on uk soil again and seize their assets here.
attributes.additional_details:
President Putin must be stopped and our politicians are to busy sat on their hands doing nothing.
One of my children asked me the other day what is the difference between a terrorist and a superpower?.
A superpower can get away with murder.
I do not wish my children to have this view of the world.
